reason: In-form sprinter who has won twice this season and holds each-way claims in a wide-open 5f field.
Recent winner and close third last time; Timeform expects him to be competitive again at a big price.
Consistent form and highlighted as the main danger to the favourite; knocking on the door for a win.
Comes here off a recent win and remains well treated; strong claims to follow up in similar conditions.
Neck second last time and well treated again; seen as a live place contender in a wide handicap.
Back-to-back runner-up efforts with new headgear; Timeform and Racing TV both highlight strong chance.
